title: A Pastoral Landscape with Shepherds Playing a Viola and Panpipes
medium: watercolor and gouache heightened with pen and ink and gold, pasted back onto page 1 of Aldus Manutius' first edition of Theocritus' Idylls and other texts (Venice, February 1496)
dimensions:
page size: 31 x 20.3 cm (12 3/16 x 8 in.)
overall size (book closed): 32.4 x 21.6 cm (12 3/4 x 8 1/2 in.)
